page.title: 10NEWTON-BORN MRS.X.
page.content: Once a farm servant,Mrs.X lives with her ex-farmworker husband in a rent- free estate cottage.Until 2 years ago it had no hot water,indoor lavatory or bathroom.DIY and a 90% Home Improve- ments grant changed her home.Most of her friends have left Newton and she is glad of an extra weekly bus,which is subsidised by the County Council. This allows her to meet her friends and shop twice weekly in Sleaford.She and her husband both require hospital treatment 30miles away and they are collected and taken by ambulance every week.She loves to hear all the local gossip and encourages people to pop in and chat to her.She is an avid TV watcher but only reads the daily news- paper.She rarely goes to church or the Village Meeting.
